string::assign (7 of 7 overloads)

Assign characters to a string.

Synopsis 
string&
assign(
    string_view s);
Description

Replaces the contents with those of a string view. This view can contain null characters.

Complexity

Linear in s.size().

Exception Safety

Strong guarantee. Calls to memory_resource::allocate may throw.

Return Value

*this

Parameters

Name

Description

s

The string view to copy from.

Exceptions

Type

Thrown On

std::length_error

s.size() > max_size().
